text: Claire Nouvian (born 19 March 1974) is a French environmental activist, journalist, television producer, and film director. == Early life and career == Claire Nouvian was born in Bordeaux. She worked in journalism. After that, she worked to protect the ocean and marine life. She was awarded the in 2012. She won the Goldman Environment Prize in 2018. She was the second French person to win this prize (after biologist Christine Jean in 1992). ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bordeaux Category:French journalists Category:French movie directors Category:French environmentalists Category:Goldman Environmental Prize awardees
title: Claire Nouvian
